         <source><br>Client for use with the X2Go network based computing environment. This Client will be able to connect to X2Go server(s) and start, stop, resume and terminate (running) desktop sessions. X2Go Client stores different server connections and may automatically request authentication data from LDAP directories. Furthermore it can be used as fullscreen loginscreen (replacement for loginmanager like xdm). Please visit x2go.org for further information.</source>

-        <location filename="onmainwindow.cpp" line="7430"/>

         <source><br>Client for use with the X2Go network based computing environment. This Client will be able to connect to X2Go server(s) and start, stop, resume and terminate (running) desktop sessions. X2Go Client stores different server connections and may automatically request authentication data from LDAP directories. Furthermore it can be used as fullscreen loginscreen (replacement for loginmanager like xdm). Please visit x2go.org for further information.</source>
         <translation><br>Ein Client fÃ¼r den Zugriff auf die serverbasierende Anwendungsumgebung X2Go.          <source><br>Client for use with the X2Go network based computing environment. This Client will be able to connect to X2Go server(s) and start, stop, resume and terminate (running) desktop sessions. X2Go Client stores different server connections and may automatically request authentication data from LDAP directories. Furthermore it can be used as fullscreen loginscreen (replacement for loginmanager like xdm). Please visit x2go.org for further information.</source>
         <translation><br>Cliente para usar con el sistema de acceso remoto X2Go. Este cliente es capaz de conectar con Ã©l/los servidor/es X2go y iniciar, parar, guardar y terminar (si estÃ¡n en ejecucion) sesiones de escritorio. El Cliente X2Go almacena diferentes conexiones a servidores y puede recuperar de manera automÃ¡tica datos de autenticaciÃ³n desde directorios LDAP. AdemÃ¡s puede usarse como un sistema de inicio de sesiÃ³n a pantalla completa (reemplazando a gestores de inicio de sesiÃ³n como xdm). Visita x2go.org para mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n.</translation>

-        <location filename="onmainwindow.cpp" line="7430"/>
+        <location filename="onmainwindow.cpp" line="7433"/>
         <source><br>Client for use with the X2Go network based computing environment. This Client will be able to connect to X2Go server(s) and start, stop, resume and terminate (running) desktop sessions. X2Go Client stores different server connections and may automatically request authentication data from LDAP directories. Furthermore it can be used as fullscreen loginscreen (replacement for loginmanager like xdm). Please visit x2go.org for further information.</source>
         <translation><br>Ein Client fÃ¼r den Zugriff auf die serverbasierende Anwendungsumgebung X2Go. Mit Hilfe dieser Anwendung kÃ¶nnen Sie Sitzungen eines X2Go Servers starten, stoppen, laufende Sitzungen fortfÃ¼hren oder anhalten und verschiedene Sitzungskonfigurationen verwalten. Die Authentifizierung kann Ã¼ber LDAP erfolgen und das Programm kann im Vollbildmodus (als Ersatz fÃ¼r XDM) gestartet werden. Weitere Informationen erhalten SIe auf x2go.org. </translation>

-        <location filename="onmainwindow.cpp" line="7430"/>
+        <location filename="onmainwindow.cpp" line="7433"/>
         <source><br>Client for use with the X2Go network based computing environment. This Client will be able to connect to X2Go server(s) and start, stop, resume and terminate (running) desktop sessions. X2Go Client stores different server connections and may automatically request authentication data from LDAP directories. Furthermore it can be used as fullscreen loginscreen (replacement for loginmanager like xdm). Please visit x2go.org for further information.</source>

         <source><br>Client for use with the X2Go network based computing environment. This Client will be able to connect to X2Go server(s) and start, stop, resume and terminate (running) desktop sessions. X2Go Client stores different server connections and may automatically request authentication data from LDAP directories. Furthermore it can be used as fullscreen loginscreen (replacement for loginmanager like xdm). Please visit x2go.org for further information.</source>

         <source><br>Client for use with the X2Go network based computing environment. This Client will be able to connect to X2Go server(s) and start, stop, resume and terminate (running) desktop sessions. X2Go Client stores different server connections and may automatically request authentication data from LDAP directories. Furthermore it can be used as fullscreen loginscreen (replacement for loginmanager like xdm). Please visit x2go.org for further information.</source>
